title: Covenant Israel Should Trust in the Lord
html:
2 Nephi 18:13. "Sanctify the Lord" Isaiah reminds covenant Israel to let God be their fear and their dread, rather than relying on mortals or the "arm of flesh."

2 Nephi 18:14. Build on it or trip over it Jehovah is the rock upon which we must build (see Helaman 5:12) but a stumbling block to those who reject him. Ultimately, however, every knee will bow and every tongue confess that Jesus is the Christ.
